solution.text:
Sodium sulphate-Mainly used in the manufacturing of detergents and as an inert compound for drying organic materials.
Sodium bisulphate-It is used as a food additive in meat and poultry.
Sodium metabisulphate-Used as a preservative to prevent the growth of microbes in pickles.
Sodium carbonate-Used as an alkalizing agent in pharmaceuticals.
